title: ISic020770. ISic020770
body:
Facsimile Images

γο
According to the editor, this is a numerical abbreviation. The assumption on the value notation comes from a comparison with an inscription on a foot of a fragmentary vessel from Sabucina (Agostiniani 2017, pp. 6-7; ISic020563) and with an identical digram on an (unpublished?) black-glazed cup in the Museo Civico Caltagirone.

Apparatus criticus

Text after Agostiniani, in Agostiniani, Albanese Procelli 2018.

English translation

1 obolus and 1/2.

Italian translation

1 obolo e 1/2 (Agostiniani 2018).

commentary

bibliography

  • Agostiniani Forthcoming MMA 60 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002519
  • Agostiniani, Albanese Procelli 2018 183-185, fig. 93 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001345
